SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AnnualReportGenerator
The AnnualReportGenerator class extends ReportGenerator and is specifically designed for generating annual reports based on scholarship data.
AnnualReportTest
The AnnualReportTest class is used to test the functionality of the AnnualReportGenerator class by comparing generated annual reports with expected reports read from CSV files.
ApplicationData
The ApplicationData class represents a container for storing pairs of questions and answers in the form of a 2D ArrayList.
ApplicationReportGenerator
The ApplicationReportGenerator class extends ReportGenerator and is specifically designed for generating application reports based on scholarship and student data.
ApplicationReportTest
The ApplicationReportTest class is used to test the functionality of the ApplicationReportGenerator class by comparing generated application reports with expected reports read from CSV files.
DemoMain
The DemoMain class represents a Swing GUI application for generating scholarship-related reports and sending them via email.
DisbursementReportGenerator
The DisbursementReportGenerator class extends ReportGenerator and is specifically designed for generating disbursement reports based on scholarship data for a student.
DisbursementReportTest
The DisbursementReportTest class is designed to test the functionality of the DisbursementReportGenerator class by comparing generated disbursement reports with expected results from test CSV files.
GMailer
GMailer is a class for sending emails using the Gmail API.
GMailerTest
The GMailerTest class is designed to test the functionality of the GMailer class by simulating the generation and sending of various reports via email.
JTextFieldWithPlaceholder
A JTextField with a placeholder that is displayed when the text field is empty and not in focus.
MatchingReportGenerator
The MatchingReportGenerator class extends ReportGenerator and is specifically designed for generating matching reports based on scholarship data and student information.
MatchingReportTest
This class contains test cases for the MatchingReportGenerator.
ReportGenerator
The is a superclass responsible for generating reports based on scholarship and student data.
Scholarship
This class represents a Scholarship with various attributes such as name, payout, deadline, etc.
ScholarshipReportGenerator
This class generates scholarship reports and writes them to CSV files.
ScholarshipReportTest
This class contains test cases for the ScholarshipReportGenerator.
Student
This class represents a Scholarship with various attributes such as name, payout, deadline, etc.
User
This class represents a User with various attributes The author of this class is backend.
